title: Can't Post Comments (Says I'm Not Level 7)
body: This forum has been denying me from posting and up/down voting all season.  I'm testing if this will post a thread, as I got to it through Board Profile.  If it works, maybe it will fix the issue elsewhere.

replies.body: Yarr, an account might need to sync up to the boards when posting for the first time.  Glad everything works now!
